title: Lakes Entrance Getaway with Daily Breakfast and Spa Credits
description: Discover the natural beauty of Lakes Entrance at Esplanade Resort & Spa. Stay in your very-own self-contained apartment and enjoy complimentary daily breakfast at the commended on-site restaurant, plus relax with six A$50 spa credits per room to put towards treatments of one hour or more. Family fun awaits at the onsite flood-lit tennis court with complimentary racquets and balls.

title: Lakes Entrance Rooms, Suites and Apartments with Indoor Pool, Onsite Restaurant & Parking
description: Located on the foreshore of Lakes Entrance, this stay overlooks two picturesque arms of the Gippsland Lakes. Facilities include an indoor heated pool, hot tub, playground and volleyball court, offering something for all ages. Onsite dining is available at Albert & Co, serving a menu of local favourites. Nearby attractions include 90 Mile Beach, the Griffiths Sea Shell Museum and scenic paddleboat rides. Walking paths are also easily accessible for those looking to explore on foot.

title: Soak up the Serenity of Lakes Entrance with A$300 Spa Credit
description: Retreat to rural Victoria and spoil yourself with a weekday stay at Bellevue on the Lakes. Boasting beautiful views across the water and located only moments away from the main strip, youâ€™ll never be too far from an abundance of activities. From National Parks and fishing hotspots, to seasonal markets showcasing local produce, there's truly something for everyone in this quaint corner of Australia. Whatever the weather, while away the stress of the everyday with a dip in the resort's heated indoor or large outdoor pool, PLUS enjoy blissful spa treatments such as aromatherapy massages, facials and more with 6 x A$50 spa credits included to use separately at the nearby Illuka Day Spa.

title: Gippsland Lakes Boutique Waterside Motel on Lakes Entrance Esplanade
description:
Experience the warmth of a family-owned retreat at this charming Gippsland motel, located just steps from Main Beach. Boasting well-appointed ground-floor rooms, each with warm, personal touches, this stay offers a true home away from home.

Unwind in the solar-heated outdoor pool and fire up the grill at the property's communal BBQ spaces. Stroll to the town's charming restaurants serving the freshest catch or head to the esplanade to charter a boat and reel in your own ocean-to-table meal.

title: Gippsland Lakes Boutique Waterside Motel on Lakes Entrance Esplanade
description: Feel at home in this comfortable Gippsland boutique motel, located just a short walk from the main beach bridge and the glorious Lakes Entrance sandbar beach. With communal BBQ spaces and a seasonal outdoor pool, you can relax in style. Take a short walk to the town's charming restaurants serving the freshest catch or, head to the esplanade to charter a boat and reel in your own ocean-to-table meal.
